metadata.title: Arbitrary file read vulnerability in AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Jenkins AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin 3.0.12 and earlier does not restrict the AWS SQS queue name path parameter in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission to obtain the contents of arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system. 
            STATEMENT: The Jenkins AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin is not shipped in any of the Red Hat products. Hence, closing as not a bug.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
